requirements.title: Health Check Endpoint
requirements.description: API must provide /health endpoint returning 200 status with version and storage information
requirements.validation_method: API GET /health returns 200 with storage field populated

requirements.title: Issue Creation
requirements.description: System must support creating issues via API/CLI with metadata persistence to YAML
requirements.validation_method: app-issue-tracker create followed by list shows new issue in YAML store

requirements.title: Issue Listing and Filtering
requirements.description: System must provide API endpoints to list and filter issues by status
requirements.validation_method: API returns filtered results based on status parameter

requirements.title: File-Based Storage
requirements.description: All issues must be stored as YAML files in data/issues/* directory structure with schema validation
requirements.validation_method: Issues persist correctly in data/issues/active, completed, failed directories

requirements.title: Investigation Trigger
requirements.description: API must support triggering AI investigation with background execution
requirements.validation_method: Investigation endpoint starts unified-resolver agent in background

requirements.title: Fix Generation
requirements.description: System must automatically generate and apply fixes via auto_resolve flag
requirements.validation_method: Investigation with auto_resolve produces transcript and applies fixes

requirements.title: CLI Operations
requirements.description: Complete CLI must support create, list, investigate commands with API backing
requirements.validation_method: CLI commands execute successfully and interact with API

requirements.title: Semantic Search
requirements.description: Vector-based similar issue detection via Qdrant integration with graceful degradation
requirements.validation_method: Search returns semantically similar issues when Qdrant available
requirements.notes: Blocked: Qdrant not available, feature disabled with keyword fallback

requirements.title: Web UI
requirements.description: Interactive React dashboard for issue management with responsive design
requirements.validation_method: UI accessible on Vite dev server with functional issue display

requirements.title: Git Integration
requirements.description: Create GitHub PRs with fixes via API endpoint

requirements.title: Export Functions
requirements.description: Generate reports in JSON, CSV, and Markdown formats
requirements.validation_method: All export formats working via /api/v1/export endpoint

requirements.title: Security Configuration
requirements.description: Production-ready CORS, authentication, and rate limiting via environment variables

requirements.title: Performance Analytics
requirements.description: Real-time resolution metrics calculation from issue timestamps
requirements.validation_method: avg_resolution_hours calculated and exposed in API

requirements.title: Integration Testing
requirements.description: Comprehensive API validation suite covering all endpoints
requirements.validation_method: test-integration.sh covers health, stats, CORS, export, git endpoints

requirements.title: Advanced Performance Dashboards
requirements.description: Historical trend analysis and forecasting capabilities

requirements.title: Multi-Agent Support
requirements.description: Different AI agents specialized for different issue types

requirements.title: Webhook Integration
requirements.description: Notify external systems on issue state changes
